name: Stellar Sphere
description: Stellar Sphere is a scifi sport game, an action game, and a space game mainly set in zero gravity, where the player must find a sphere and throw it against the active wormhole. Winning the game will need a combination of skills and using the best tactics in order to survive.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel I3 1.8Ghz Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Intel graphics 4400 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1 GB available space Sound Card: Internal
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel I5 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia Geforce 960 or equivalent DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1 GB available space Sound Card: Internal
